Uses of Class
com.inrupt.client.Request.Builder

  • Packages that use Request.Builder 
    Package Description
    com.inrupt.client
    Application interfaces for the Inrupt Java Client Libraries.

    • Uses of Request.Builder in com.inrupt.client

      Methods in com.inrupt.client that return Request.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.DELETE()
      A convenience method for building an HTTP DELETE request.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.GET()
      A convenience method for building an HTTP GET request.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.HEAD()
      A convenience method for building an HTTP HEAD request.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.header​(String name, String value)
      Set an individual header for this request.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.method​(String method, Request.BodyPublisher publisher)
      Set the HTTP method for this request.
      static Request.Builder Request.newBuilder()
      Creates a Request builder.
      static Request.Builder Request.newBuilder​(URI uri)
      Creates a Request builder with the given URI.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.PATCH​(Request.BodyPublisher publisher)
      A convenience method for building an HTTP PATCH request with a body.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.POST​(Request.BodyPublisher publisher)
      A convenience method for building an HTTP POST request with a body.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.PUT​(Request.BodyPublisher publisher)
      A convenience method for building an HTTP PUT request with a body.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.setHeader​(String name, String value)
      Set an individual header for this request.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.timeout​(Duration timeout)
      Set a timeout value for this request.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.type​(String type)
      A convenience method for setting a Content-Type header.
      Request.Builder Request.Builder.uri​(URI uri)
      Set the URI for this request.
